response_requirements.initial_response_description: Public records open for inspection at all times during office hours; must provide promptly
response_requirements.final_response_notes: No specific deadline in statute; records available during regular office hours

fee_structure.search_fee_notes: Cannot charge for search or retrieval time
fee_structure.copy_fee_notes: Fee set by Director of Arizona Department of Administration; cannot exceed actual reproduction cost
fee_structure.electronic_fee: Actual cost of producing electronic records
fee_structure.advance_payment: May require advance payment for copying and postage

exemptions.description: Library records identifying person as requesting, using, or borrowing materials
Records received by legislators during session deemed confidential
Billing information identifying residential locations or usage patterns
Trade secrets and confidential commercial information

appeal_process.first_level_notes: No administrative appeal specified; court enforcement available
appeal_process.criminal_penalties: Class 2 misdemeanor for unlawful refusal to allow examination

requester_requirements.purpose_statement_notes: Commercial purpose requests require statement of commercial use; Governor may prohibit if misuse
requester_requirements.request_format_notes: May request to examine, copy, or have mailed; no specific form required

agency_obligations.records_officer_notes: Officer has custody of public records
agency_obligations.response_format_options: May examine, receive copies, or have records mailed
agency_obligations.index_required: Must maintain index of public records or alternative system approved by State Library
agency_obligations.written_statement_required: Must promptly furnish written statement of statutory authority for disclosure/nondisclosure if requested

oversight_body.name: Arizona State Library, Archives and Public Records Department
oversight_body.role: Approves alternative organizational systems for record indexing

validation_metadata.verification_notes: All fields manually verified from official Arizona statute. Records open during office hours. No specific response deadline (ground truth shows 10 business days typical). Cannot charge search fees - only actual reproduction cost per state-set rate. Commercial requests require purpose statement; Governor may prohibit if misuse. Class 2 misdemeanor for unlawful refusal. Must maintain record index or approved alternative system.
